extensionDescription.message: Shows a notification when the user encrypts their password.

notificationContentSuccess.message: Your password has been succesfully encrypted
notificationContentSuccess.description: Tells the user that their password has been succesfully encrypted.

notificationContentFailedNullValue.message: Encryption failed: for security reasons you cannot encrypt an empty password.
notificationContentFailedNullValue.description: Tells the user that empty values cannot be encrypted.

notificationContentFailedNullDomainValue.message: Encryption failed: the domain is empty.
notificationContentFailedNullDomainValue.description: Tells the user that empty values cannot be encrypted.

notificationContentFailedInvalidDomainVa.message: Encryption failed: the domain is not a valid domain.
notificationContentFailedInvalidDomainVa.description: Tells the user that the domain has not been filled in correctly.

notificationContentShortcutFailedToFindC.message: Encryption failed: the current tab needs to be reloaded or is not a normal webpage.
notificationContentShortcutFailedToFindC.description: Tells the user that the solution in case a port cannot be found.
